medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Intermittent right-sided abdominal pain for the last few months, worsening to more constant pain over the last 48 hours. Current pain is described as crampy and constant, rated as worse at its peak but improved after receiving pain medication. Patient is having trouble getting comfortable. No correlation with meals and onset of the pain.
medical_history.family_history: Grandmother with breast cancer, mother with diabetes, hypertension, and coronary artery disease; father is well and athletic; one sister with hypertension.
